name: Supa Mario Galxy 2
description:
Supa Mario Glaxy 2

A little hard Mario Game.

Try to get to the castle at the end without touching anything to be free of your shadow!

 

Play as Mario who just arrived to the Cheap's Lands!

Be aweare of shadow Mario, he wont leave Mario never alone!

Credits

Made by Eufrasio in 8 hours

Hope you like the game!
